DOC.brief_summary: Bariatric surgery provides a strong and long-term effect in reducing weight in obese subjects. Studies showed that obesity and its comorbidities are associated with a lower cognitive performance. The aim of the researchers study is to examine the cognitive performance of the patients before and after bariatric surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Change in Cognitive Function in Obese Patients After Bariatric Surgery - an Observational Study
